Text:
This torrent download contains the program:
StreamboxRipper2009

When you ask it to decode music.rm audio files to music.wav, music.wma, or music.mp3, the program asks for:

Ripper
Decoding of the file requires external codec. Please download and install G2 Player (www.real.com) Codec info (sipr)
OK

When you click OK, the decoding process closes, and won't start again.

I haven't been able to find the G2 Player at www.real.com...
